stories.title: Ask HN: Why would a city on Mars avoid Armageddon? War can happen on Mars also

stories.text:
When I'm using my (Andorid) phone I keep seeing recurring ads for Whatsapp, Tiktok, Deliveroo, etc..

I have these apps installed, and some of them I use daily. So I'm wondering if the targeting is explicit or is just a mistake?

I see only 2 scenarios:

- The ad targeting system can't see that I have these apps installed (Good i guess in terms of privacy)

- The ad system can see that I have the apps, but the companies still pushing their ads (waste of money?)

Does anyone here have any domain knowledge about these kind of ads?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why do I see ads for apps that I have installed?
